players

Class DebugPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • players.Player
      • players.DebugPlayer

  • public class DebugPlayer
extends Player
    Class that allow you to play the Videopoker in Debug mode. This class is important to test your game. when facing some peculiar situations. You can test your game by considering a file with the commands you want to check and the cards that will be played during this mode
    Author:
    Alexandre Candeias, Pedro Martinho, Rui Figueiredo

        public void ReadCmds(java.lang.String filename)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Method used to read an input file with commands and store those commands into an ArrayList of strings
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • Play

        public void Play()
        Method used to play the game in Debug mode. Considering the given commands the game is going to be played until the all the commands are executed or the cards provided in the card file are finished
        Specified by:
        Play in class Player
